answers.answer: Hi there. If all the blood work for tingling and burning sensations in limbs is negative, you need to be investigated for a compressive neuropathy. get an MRI scan done which would show if there is any bony impingement, spondylolisthesis, disc degeneration, prolapse etc. I assume workup for diabetes, hypothyroidism, B12 deficiency have come negative. If this is inconsequential, certain autoimmune disorders need to be worked up, multiple sclerosis and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. These are basically diagnosis of exclusion. A Detailed neurological examination is warranted before any treatment is started so consult a neurologist soon. Take care.

question: experiencing right upper back and underarm also left hip burning prickly sensation without any rash.  saw md and all bloodwork including lyme negative.  Urinalysis negative.  taking naproxen and tylenol with no relief.  unable to sleep.ANY IDEAS??
title: burning sensation right upper back and underarm
